inclusion.criterion: Prior to Diagnosis of IBS + diarrhea based on ICD 10 codes with or without constipation unresponsive to prior treatments
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Moderate to severe symptom severity score (>175 points) based on IBS symptom severity scale
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Seeking evaluation by a health care professional
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No response to lactose elimination diet by history
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to complete symptoms diaries and global evaluations
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Confirmed IgE dependent food allergy as a cause of the gastrointestinal symptoms.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Post-surgical GI symptoms (e.g., dumping syndrome) by history
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Pt is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
